title: The Bobby Shmurda Interview: Dancing Controversy, Prison, Girls, Fronto & More
description:
Bobby sits down with Adam for a casual and candid conversation. Bobby reflects on his upbringing, the ups and downs, making better choices, spreading positivity with his dance moves and looking forward to everything he has in the works! New documentary coming soon! https://www.instagram.com/itsbobbyshm... ----- NO JUMPER PATREON http://www.patreon.com/nojumper CHECK OUT OUR NEW SPOTIFY PLAYLIST https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5te... FOLLOW US ON SNAPCHAT FOR THE LATEST NEWS & UPDATES https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_...
